about_the_game:
Raise a naive young aristocrat

After racking up a huge amount of gambling debt, Edward seeks means to repay it while struggling to discover true love and what he wants to do with his life.
But he has only one year to accomplish all this.
How he spends that precious time depends on you, the player.
Decide what Edward learns, who he spends time with, and thereby the course of his life.

Edward can pursue romantic relationships with two characters: one of them is (naturally) Alex, the protagonist of Beyond Eden and Edward’s crush.
The other is Francis Taylor, a meek yet affectionate young man. Francis is a former classmate of Edward’s from the boarding school and was also involved in the incident which got Edward expelled.

Limited features in the demo
- The demo consists of the prologue portion of the full version.
- The demo does not provide voices and sexual contents.

content_descriptors.notes: The demo does not provide sexual contents. But, two links are found on the main menu that connect to full games with Adult-only content. ("Beyond Eden", "Beyond Eden: Dear Edward")

Raise a naive young aristocrat

After racking up a huge amount of gambling debt, Edward seeks means to repay it while struggling to discover true love and what he wants to do with his life.
But he has only one year to accomplish all this.
How he spends that precious time depends on you, the player.
Decide what Edward learns, who he spends time with, and thereby the course of his life.

The other is Francis Taylor, a meek yet affectionate young man. Francis is a former classmate of Edward’s from the boarding school and was also involved in the incident which got Edward expelled.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Beyond Eden: Dear Edward Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: "Beyond Eden" spin-off "Beyond Eden: Dear Edward" is a Boy's Love Life Sim centered on Edward, the callow young aristocrat from the previous game. Follow Edward’s progress as he moves to London staggering under a pile of debt, strives to pay it off and surprisingly find love along the way.
